entry.title: x-threads/x-zen: x-zen ‚Äî Minimal Framework for Scalable Node.js Applications X-zen is a lightweight and modular TypeScript framework inspired by the design philosophy of NestJS, but with a simplified and flexible core. It provides a clean, declarative way to build backend applications using decorators, dependency injection, and modular architecture.
entry.content: x-zen ‚Äî Minimal Framework for Scalable Node.js Applications X-zen is a lightweight and modular TypeScript framework inspired by the design philosophy of NestJS, but with a simplified and flexible core. It provides a clean, declarative way to build backend applications using decorators, dependency injection, and modular architecture.

entry.title: SamarthKulkarni20/keyed-batched-items-accumulator: A lightweight utility for Node.js projects that accumulates items into fixed-size batches per key, preserving insertion order within each key. Streams items directly into their respective batches at runtime, eliminating the overhead of post-processing 1D arrays into chunks. It abstracts key-based batch management.
entry.content: A lightweight utility for Node.js projects that accumulates items into fixed-size batches per key, preserving insertion order within each key. Streams items directly into their respective batches at runtime, eliminating the overhead of post-processing 1D arrays into chunks. It abstracts key-based batch management.
